quotes: AI is the new electricity. — Andrew Ng
The pace of AI progress is incredibly fast. — Elon Musk
AI won’t replace people; people using AI will. — Fei-Fei Li
The future is already here; it’s just unevenly distributed. — William Gibson
AI amplifies human creativity. — Demis Hassabis
With great power comes great responsibility — especially in AI. — Timnit Gebru
AI augments human intelligence. — Yann LeCun
Ensure AI is aligned with human values. — Dario Amodei
Transparency and explainability build trust. — Margaret Mitchell
AI is only as good as its data. — Kate Crawford
